name: sqlite-vector (sqliteai)
description: [项目级] SQLite-Vector is a cross-platform, ultra-efficient SQLite extension that brings vector search capabilities to your embedded database.。来源: https://github.com/sqliteai/sqlite-vector

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
SQLite-Vector is a cross-platform, ultra-efficient SQLite extension that brings vector search capabilities to your embedded database.

来源: https://github.com/sqliteai/sqlite-vector
语言: C
Stars: 675
